level.text: If a substance abuse facility or program has received a statement of deficiencies due to violations of this chapter, the Department may reinspect the facility or program.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9341 (November 24, 2000), adopting Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7708, 7718 (September 22, 2000).
